#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	int t;
	int n,i;
	string inp;
	
	scanf("%d",&n);
	cin>>inp;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		string b;
		cin>>b;
		int x=inp.length();
		
		while(x--){
			int pos=inp.find(b);
			if(pos==string::npos){
				break;
			}
			else{
			inp.erase(pos,b.length());
		
			}
		}
	}
	if(inp=="")
	cout<<0;
	else
	cout<<inp;
		return 0;
}
